title: Sylvio
notes: Works well, but requires Steam Launch option "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%"

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc6-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Game works out of the box with like native performance. Note that it has the same issues as on Windows with controller detection and wrong screen prompts for button presses.
title: Sylvio
